page.title: 04A SMALL,RURAL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Children commence full-time primary education at the age of five,but they are introduced into school through the Nursery Service and then into part-time schooling at four and a half.They are attached to an infant group for two years,two terms,then into juniors.Grouped according to age,but range of ability and interest plays an important part in planning day to day activities.We try to help each child to make the best possible use of his or her abilities.Educational visits planned to stimulate and challenge.To help broaden their experiences.Co-operative ventures are planned with other schools.We enjoy excellent support from our Governors,parents and members of the community.We are a focus for a number of community activities.A Further Education Class uses school.
